statements.query: MATCH (n:GCPOrganization) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP organizations that are out of date.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPOrganization)-[r:RESOURCE]->(:GCPProject) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP Organization relationships that are out of date.
